channel.title: Comments on: Boraging free
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: By: Dead Badger
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: I'm not really getting a beehive. Am tempted to get a real smoker and one of those hats, though. For the look, you see; it's very in.
item.content:encoded: I’m not really getting a beehive. Am tempted to get a real smoker and one of those hats, though. For the look, you see; it’s very in.

item.title: By: j-rizzle
item.dc:creator: j-rizzle
item.description: I'm afraid of bees. Why are you getting a beehive!? What if they come in your house and sting you?
item.content:encoded: I’m afraid of bees. Why are you getting a beehive!? What if they come in your house and sting you?
